description: small, wide, placid face with wide, nearly closed eyes; flat nose; small mouth; ears set far back; hair has motifs of arrowhead-like braids; knob at top of head with seven extending ribs; seven pendant elements around hairline; attached twisted dried plant vine around bottom edge; dark brown-black patina
inscription:
Inscription and Tag

at interior edge, in black on white: [86-87-1]
title: Helmet mask
